thread.title: Public Schools Closed Thursday as Snowstorm Heads to NYC
thread.title_full: Public Schools Closed Thursday as Snowstorm Heads to NYC

title: Public Schools Closed Thursday as Snowstorm Heads to NYC
text:
View Full Caption DNAinfo/Eddie Small 
NEW YORK CITY — New York City Public Schools will be closed Thursday due to a heavy snowstorm, city officials said. ⚠ Due to expected severe weather conditions, all New York City public schools will be CLOSED tomorrow, Thursday, February 9, 2017 [1/3] pic.twitter.com/c7KDYWk7Qg — NYC Public Schools (@NYCSchools) February 8, 2017 
  updates.
